description: Check if transaction involves high-risk jurisdictions.
prompt_instructions: Analyze the transaction details provided below.
Extract the originating country code (e.g., GB) and the destination country code (e.g., DO).
Assume the following countries are currently considered high-risk: North Korea (KP), Iran (IR), Dominican Republic (DO).
Check if either the originating country OR the destination country is in the high-risk list.
Respond with 'High-Risk Jurisdiction Involved: Yes (Country: <CODE>)' if a high-risk country is found, specifying the first high-risk country code found.
Respond with 'High-Risk Jurisdiction Involved: No' if neither country is on the high-risk list.
If country codes cannot be extracted, respond with 'Error: Country codes not found'.
